src:
Foto: Kamión s návesom sa prevrátil pri zjazde z diaľnice D3 do Žiliny, cestu museli uzavrieť
04 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Webnoviny
4.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Cesta I/60 zo Žiliny do Bytče je obojsmerne uzavretá. Vozovku v celej šírke totiž zablokoval kamión s návesom, ktorý sa prevrátil pri zjazde z diaľnice D3 do Žiliny. K dopravnej nehode došlo krátko pred 14:00. Podľa aktuálnych informácií z dopravného servisu je výjazd zo Žiliny na diaľnicu D3 prejazdný bez obmedzení.
Viac k témam: diaľnica D3, dopravná nehoda, havária kamiónuZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Foto: Kamión s návesom sa prevrátil pri zjazde z diaľnice D3 do Žiliny, cestu museli uzavrieť © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Photo: A truck with a semi-trailer overturned on the D3 motorway to Žilina, the road had to be closed
04 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Webnoviny
4.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Road I / 60 from Žilina to Bytča is closed in both directions. The road in its full width was blocked by a truck with a semi-trailer, which overturned on the D3 motorway to Žilina. The accident occurred shortly before 14:00. According to current information from the transport service, the exit from Žilina to the D3 motorway is accessible without restrictions.
More on topics: D3 highway, traffic accident, truck crashSource: Webnoviny.sk - Photo: A truck with a semi-trailer overturned at the D3 motorway exit to Žilina, the road had to be closed © SITA All rights reserved.
